name: Noondays We Watched the Sun
description:
A short walking sim about leaving. It was going to be somewhat autobiographical but now it is super not. Explore the old hills, let memories come back to you, and leave when you're ready. You won't be back.

WASD to walk around. Shift to run. Hold left mouse to interact with things. Escape to close the game if need be. You can only see each message once. Interact with the car when you're ready to go.

By Avery Campbell.

The music samples Jimmy Jewel and Hey, Black Sunshine by The Knit Separates. You can find their stuff on Bandcamp. You'll love it. You get the background music when you download the game or you can check it out at dawnhorsemusic.bandcamp.com.

Made in Unity with Playmaker by Hutong Games. Assets by me and 3Dfrk, AdventureForge, Final Form Studio, Ferocious Industries, Mr. Andrew Chapman, Pointless Clouds, Imagine Emotion, Monqo Studios, Ioan Stan, Wissam El Hajj, and Duane's Mind.  Car sound from freesound.org, by prometheus888.
